    org.spf4j.failsafe
    This package contains operation retry utilities.
    org.spf4j.failsafe.concurrent  

    • Uses of InterruptibleCompletableFuture in org.spf4j.concurrent

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContextPropagatingCompletableFuture<T>
      A Completable future that will wrap all Functions to properly propagate ExecutionContext.
